content: Just touched down in NYC after an incredible stint in Japan. Feeling both excited and a bit disoriented. Time to recalibrate and see how my experiences there can shape my next moves in tech.

content: Setting up my new workspace in Brooklyn. The skyline's a stark contrast to Tokyo's. Got an idea for a DeFi project - something that blends the community aspect of Japan's tech scene with blockchain. Let's see where this goes.

content: Just had a call with a mentor from Tokyo. He's interested in my DeFi idea but suggested focusing on user experience first. Time to dive into UX design!
